players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. He was found dead this morning, but I remained silent as usual."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, I think he killed Charlie last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
